price: 18. Diena, kai Ragas bus papūstas ir jūs išeisite miniomis,
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fatatūna afwājan
